(senshar), n. khakna, sawisêlna. v.t. sawisêl, khak.
(sensas), n. rama chêng zât mihring chhiarna.
(sent), n. pawisa tlang dollar zaa \hen hmun khat.
(sentawr), n. hmasâng Grik thawnthua sakawlh a taksa chanve chi mihring, a chanve chu sakawr.

n. kum zaa upa.
(sentenial), adj. kum za thil.
adj. zaa \hena hmun khat.

centigramme, n. gram(me) zaa \hena hmun khat.
n. litre zaa \hena hmun khat.

(sentrifugal), adj. a lai a\anga thên chhuah tum. (Hruia lungtum hlînte hi han vaivir ila, han thlah thut ila, a centrifugal force (tha) chuan a virna lai kan kut ata kha a thlawh chhuak daih mai ang).

n. century sipai hotu.

adj. lu nei.

n. rinhlelh loh thil, loh theih loh thil, dika nemnghehna.
n. rinhlelh lohna.

a riruang siam, duang.

(chhânsmedli), adj. tual thah palh (a thattu pawh a fimkhur loh vâng emawa thiam chang thei vak bîk lo).

n. hla satu, zaipâwl hruaitu, bazaa a thlûk sakna kuang.
(kêaws), n. mumal lohna, buai nuai nuaina. chaotic, adj.

(shaperawn), n., v.t. hmeichhe naupang zahawm taka châwm liantu hmeichhia, chutianga châwm lian.

(chhariawt), n. sakawrtawlailîr, hmasânga indona leh intlânsiak nâna an hman sakawrtawlailîr.

(The king flew in a chartered plane - Lalber chu ama puala thlawhna ruat bîkah chuan a thlâwk a).
(chhêra), adj. renchem, fîmkhur.
(chheis), v.t. ûm, sa pêl, hnawt bo. n. inûmna, sa pêl, sa hnu chhui. wild-goose chase, n. thil beisei phâk loh tûr ûmna. chase, n. khâwl ha chelh khâwmna kâwm.
(kazm), n. kua, lei chat, thil khi or kak, leilâwt.
(shasi), n. motor leh tawlailîr taksa pum innghahna ruangâm.
(chheist), adj. nungchanga thianghlim, thinlung thianghlim, nula/tlangvâl la ngai lo, pâwlpui la nei lo, hnahkhat.
n. hurna laka fihlîm or thianghlim.
(chhesn), v.t. hremna nêna tithianghlim, hrem, sim tûra hrem.
(chhastaiz), v.t. sim tûra hrem, hrem zal, hremna nêna thunun.
(chhat), v.i. titi, tlângnêl taka inkâwm.

v.t. man leh hming tihniam or titlâwm.
(chhît), v.t. bum. n. bumhmang.

(chhek), v.t. tiding, chelh, dang, hau, endik, chîk, fiah, ze killi tam taka \ial (check shirt - kamis dung leh vâng zâwnga ze \ial nei). n. chess khelhnaah chuan a lal vauna, tihdinna, danna, thil hming ziah tlara duh zawng zawng chhinchhiahna thai hi, pawisaa chantîr theih lehkha thupêk (dân narânin 'cheque'), ze killi nei insi \hat.
n. chess khêla a lal dan tawngkhawngna.
(chhekarz), n. draught (draft) infiamna.
(chhîk), n. biang, kawngka biang, zahtheih lohna.
adj. zakthei lo, luhlul.
(chhîr), n. rilru put dân hlimna, râwl nêna lawmpui or fuihna, inlawmna. v.t. hnêm, fuih, lâwm, lawmpui.
adj. hlim, lâwm (cheery an ti bawk). cheerily, cheerfully, advs.
(chhîz), n. Sâp saum kan tih mai, bâwnghnute khal a\anga thingfanghma phel hmêl ang tak thil khal an siam.
(chhîtâ), n. keite chi khat (ramsa zînga tlân chak bera an sawi).
(shef), n. chawchhûm or eisiam hotu ber.
(kairawmansi), n. kutze en. (Grik, cheir - kut. manteia - hrilh lâwkna).
(shemîz), n. hmeichhe kawrhnuai.
(kemistri), n. leilung thil rêng rêng hi eng a\ang leh eng anga siam nge tia chhuina. chemical, adj.
(chhek), n. pawisaa chan theih lehkha, pawisa lâkna lehkha (check an ti bawk).
checkered, adjs. ze hrang hrang nei (chess khêlna ang), vânneihna leh vânduaina inchawhpawlh.
(chherish), v.t. ngaina, ngaihlu, thinlunga vei or chhawm.
(sherût), n. vaihlozial hrawl tak, churut a hmawra zum or zuih ve lo chi.
(chheri), n. theite chi khat. adj. cherry hmin anga tai.
(chherab), n. serafîm chi khat, naupang duhawm tak. cherubs, cherubim leh cherubims, pl. of cherub.
(chhes), n. sa atâna milem ker hmanga innawrna or infiamna.
(chhest), n. thingrem hrawl tak, tangka bâwm, âwm (bâwr).
chesnut (chhesnat), nn. thingsemîm. adj. rawng sen-uk.
(shevalîr), n. sakawr chungchuang mi, pasal\ha, mi tlâwmngai.
(shevrawn), n. inchung dokalhna, sipai belkaite bâna an bel hi.
(chhu), v.t. \hial. n. sahdah hmuam khat. chew the cud, ran \henkhatina an thil ei an irh chhuah leha an \hial nawn ang hi, ngun taka ngaihtuah.
n. \helrêt thlum.
(shîk), n., adj. silhfên chi thar, thil chîn thar (style), nalh.
(chhik), n. artê, sava no, naupang koh duatna.
n. artê, âr, ârsa, naupang.
n. mi dawizep. chicken-hearted, adj. dawizep.
n. tangseh.

(chhaid), v.t. hau, zilh, kamkhat.

adv. pawimawh berah chuan, dân narânin.
(chhiftin), n. chi khat lal.
(shîniawn, shîniawng), n. samzial, hrûm.
(chhilblein), n. khawvawh laia kut leh ke vûng.
(chhaild), n. naupang, fa. (children, pl.). with child, nau pai.
n. nau veina.
n. nau hrinna.
n. naupan lai.
adj. naupang chhe thil, thil ho.
adj. naupang chhia ang.
thil awlsam tak (naupang chumchiap pawhina an tih ve theih chi).
(chhil), n. hritlâng, mi tinguitu. adj. vawt tia khûr, hritlâng kai. v.i. vâwt ti. v.t. tivâwt, tingui.
adj. vawt. chillness, chilliness, nn.
(chhili), n. hmarcha.
chimera (kimira), n. hmasâng Grik thawnthua samak nu meialha thaw chhuak, a lu chu sakeibaknei lu, a taksa chu kêl, a mei chu rûlpui ang, thil awihawm lo tih nân pawh an hmang.

(chhimni), n. meikhuchhuah, lal\în dârthlalang.

(chhin), n. khabe.
(chhaina), n. sailungvâr ang reng thlêng leh no leh thîrhrui ban lu bâwk siam nâna an hman.
(chhingk), n. kak, khi chat, pawisa thin rîk chheng chheng. v.i. ri chheng chheng.
(chhip), v.t. thîrkhen nêna ker, thel. n. thing har, thelna hâwng or hâr te tak tê, pawisa pound khat. chip of the old block, pa te ze khawk hlauh.
(chhipmangk), n. hleimualrâng.
(kairawpawdist), n. singsihlît ilo tidamtu dâktawr.
n. ke lam natna enkawl thiam.
(charp, a kum tak), n., v.i. sava hrâm, hrâm.
(chhisl), n. thirkhen. v.t. ker.
(chhit), n. lehkha thema thu thawn, slip.
(shivalri), n. pasal\ha tlâwmngaihna leh hawihhâwmna.
adj. tlâwmngai, hawihhâwm.
(chhawklit), n. kurtai hmâwngsâwi ang thil thlum. adj. chocolate rawng ang, sen-uk.
(chhawis), n. thlanna, duh zâwk thlanna, a \ha ber. adj. thlan nahawm.
(khuair), n. zaipâwl, biak ina zaipâwl awmna hmun.
(chhawk), v.t., v.i. rêk, inhnawh tâwt, thaw thei lova siam.
(kawlar), n. pumpui aikal, thinurna, thinchhiatna.
adj. thinchhia.
(kawlara), n. tuihri. choleraic (kawlereik), adj.
(chhuz), v.t. thlang. chose (chhawz), pa.t of choose.
(chhawp) v.t. tan, tan chhum, chêk, ek, chan sawm. n. chhumbung, thil tan chhum, kêl or berâm or vawksa hrang (a nâk ruh telin).
(chhawpstiks), n. China hovina thîrfian leh thîrkut aia chaw ei nâna an hman mau hmawlh kawp khat.
(khawrd), n. hla thlûka ri hrang hrang inhmeh or inthlâwp, rîn kual khungtu rînngîl.
(kawria), n. zâwngsihsiamsual natna.
(kawriawgrafi), n. lâm dân kawnghmang buatsaihna.
(chhawrtl), v.i. aw hniam leh thûm deuhva nui.
(kâwras), n. zaipâwl, thunawn. v.t. a huhova sa.
adj. zaipâwl leh thunawn thil.
(krizm), n. hriak thianghlim, hriak thianghlim inhnawihna. chrismal, adj.
(khraist), n. Hriak thianghlim hnawiha chu, Messia.
(khrisn), v.t. Krista hminga baptisma chantîr, hming sa.
(khrisndam), n. Kristianna ram, Kriatian zawng zawng impumkhatna.
n. Krista zuitu.
(khristianais), v.t. Kristiana chantîr, Kristianna.
n. Krista Kohhran, Kristianna.
Krista pian a\anga hun chhiar.
baptisma hming, hming hmasa. (Peter Miller-a fapa chuan baptisma a chan laiin John Miller hming pu ta se, John chu a Christian name a ni ang a, Miller chu a pa hming chhawm a surname a ni ang).
damdawi kher hmang lova rinna nêna natna tihdam theih rinna.
(khrismas, khrismis tia lam ri pawh an awm), n. Krista pianchamphaphâk.
Krismas hma ni, December ni 24.
Krismas hun lai vêl.
(khristawlawji), n. Kristian sakhaw zirna lama Krista nunphung chhuina pêng.
(khrawmatik), adj. rawng lampang thil, solfa lama tone chanve indawt.
n. rawng lampang science.
n. baw leh tui mûr chhûnga mize inthlahchhâwnna hlo.
n. ni vêla boruak kâng êng pap.
(khrawnik), adj. hun rei awh chi, natna hun rei tak awh chi, natna ril tak.
(khrawnikl), n. hun kal zêla thil lo thleng chhinchhiahna. v.t. a indawta thil lo thleng chhinchhiah.
(khrawnawlawji), n. hun tehna, hun indawt dân.
(khrawnawmitar), n. hun vawtu or vaitu khâwl.
(khrisanthimam), n. derhken chi khat nihawi ang deuhva par.
(chhabi), adj. chum, chawm, bing.
(chhak), n. arpui \uk ri, âr, koh duatna. v.i. \uk. chuck (chhak), v.i. paih theh.
(chhakl), n., v.i. nui heuh heuh, arpui \uk, arpui note koh anga ko (a-a a, chiuhiah, etc.).
(chham), n. \hian kawmngeih tak.
adj. nelawm, kawm nuam.
(chhamp), n. thingtum lu lam.
(chhangk), n. thil chhum bung hrawl tak. (cut off a chunk of meat - sa hrang hrawl tak hlep thla).
n. Biak In, Kristian kohhran, kohhran khai dingtute (pastor, puithiam etc.).
n. Biak In hung chhûnga thlânmual.
n. leia sual do lai mêk kohhran.
n. vana kohhran, sual hneh tawha vâna chêngte.
n. thingtlâng mi, mi mâwl, mi chimawm. churlish, adj.
v.t., v.i. chawk, hawt, phuan or so but but.
(shût), n. tuikhawhthla, suar, thil tleng thlâk or luan thlâktîrna kawng.
chutnee (chhatni), n. Vai thei thûr um, chaw\ani.
(kail), sa chek vâra a tuihnâng vâr.
(sikada), n. thereng.
(sikêtriks), n. pân ser.
(saidar), n. apple zu.
(sigâr), n. vaihlo zial, churut.
(sinchh), sakawr zîn hrênna, (\awng lêrah chuan) ni chiah, dik chiah. v.i. sakawr zîn hrêng mar.
(singkawna), n. thing chi khat, a pil a\anga sikserh damdawi (quinine) an siam \hin hi.
(sindar), n. vâp, kâng vâp, kâng ût.
(sinimatawgraf), n. cinema khâwl, cinema, cinema chhuahna hmun (a kaihtawi cinema hi an chîng mah tawh zâwk).
(sinerari), adj. vun lam thil.
(sinamawn), n. thakthing.
(saifar), n. (bial) (0), Arab nambar, thil hlutna ngah lo, engmah lo, thuruk ziak dân, ziak rûk. v.i. chhiarkawp chawk, thurûk or ziak rûk ziak.
n. rîn bial, rîn kual, thil bial, thil kual, thil tlar rêng rêng a \annaa tâwp, mipui rual khat, mipui zîng. v.t., v.i. kal kual, hêl kual. circular, adj.
(sarkit), n. a hualtu kawng, a vêltu kawng, electric kalna, zau lam, zin kualna.
(sarkhiutas), adj. kual, kîkawi.
(sarkhiular), adj. bial, kual. n. mi tam tak hnêna hriattirna thawn darh.

(krawk), n. bûr, bêl.
n. hluma siam bungbêl.
(krawk), berâm or sakawr tar lam, tar chhia.
(krawkawdail), n. awle.
vei uk lova \ah, tuar taktak lova pawiti der.

n. khanchhuk.
n. thal ngul khamphei (a kawkalh zâwnga thal dahna nei).
n. inthlah pawlh a\anga lo piang.
adj., adv. lamlian zawh lova ram palailenga kal or tlân.
n. a kham zâwnga tan, pumpelh.
v.t. chîk taka dâwp, zawt fiah, thubuaia inkhingte zînga a lehlam \angte dâwp.
n. mitkalh.
n. silaia inkah tawnna.
n. kawng \huam.

(khraun), n. lallukhum, lalber, lalna, thil chhîp rêng rêng, ha lang chin (a hni chhûnga mi tiam lovin), thil zunga a leiseh chin or a zung leh a kûng inhmuhna lai, lehkha phêk inches 15 leh 20 inbial [Zorama kan kâr tin chanchinbu tam zawk hi chu double crown (crown lêt hnih) hmun lia \hena hmun khat hleh thlâk a ni]. v.t. lallukhum khumtîr, chhîn, cheimawi, nalh taka tlip.
(khrusibl), thîr hlo laih chhuah chhuan tuina hlum bêl.
(khrûsifai), v.t. khêngbet, nghaisa.
(khrûd), adj. phawk, mawl, la chei \hat loh, chei mâm loh.
(khruel), adj. nunrâwng. cruelty, n.
(khrûit), n. chaw ei dawhkâna hmuihmer dip dahna bûr.
(khrûz), v.i. lawng kar, lawnga veivâk, chak lutuk lo leh zâwi lutuk lova kal or thlâwk (cruising speed, kal dân or thlawh dân pangngai tluka chak).
n. indo lawng lian (battleship) leh lawng tê (destroyer) inkâra mi, indo lawng laihawl.
(khram), n. chhang nawi, ningnawi, buhmal, chhang hnip lai.
(khrambl), v.i., v.t. kehchhia, tinawi.
(khrûmen), n. sakhi leh sazuk mit hnuaia a thei thuhrûkna.
(khrampl), v.t., v.i. hlâwm chuar, hmet hlâwm, tichuar, keh chhiattîr, chuar, kehchhia.
(khranchh), v.t. \hial ri hmawrh hmawrh.
(khrûral), adj. ke lam thil, ke ang.
(khruseid), n. Turkey (Mosolman ram) hnuai a\anga Palestina ram thianghlim lâk tuma Europe khawmualpui a\anga Kristian sipai an rammutna, \hahnemngai taka beihpui siamna.
n. crusade pâwla kal ve.
(khrash), v.t., v.i. tikeh, tisawm, hnawh muk, râwt sawm, hneh, tikeh chhia.
n. mipui dâl or daidanna pal.
(khrast), n. hâwng, pil, kâwr, chhangthâwp pâwn lam (a ût lai), lei pâwnlâng or tuamtu.

(khraks), n. kros, thil khirhkhaâ tak, thil pawimawhna lai tak.
(khrai), v.i., v.t., n. \ap, hrâm, awih tuar, ring taka sawi, a huhova ngenna, au hla, hming chhâlna (war-cry, battle-cry - râl beih laia hming chhâl). a far cry, inkârhlat.
n. tlangâu.
adj. ring taka koh, ngaihsak ngiat.

(khiubizm), n. tûn lai lem ziak dân chi thara cube pianhmanga lem ziak dân thar (a sîr leh a hnung lam pawh a hma lamah an lantîr vek \hîn).
(khiubikl), n. mut pindan, pindan.
(khiubit), n. tawng khat.
(khakhawld), n. mi an nupui miina an uire sak. v.t. uire sak.
(khukhû), n. sava chi khat 'Kukku, kukku' tia hrâm chi.
(khiukhambar), n. fanghma.

(khar), n. uicho, ui chuang, mi dukdak lo.

(kharfiu), n. (hmasâng chuan) râl leh kângmei laka invên nâna thimhlim or zâna mei zawng zawng tihmih tûra dâr vuak, dân hlui chhawma hun bi neia dâr vuak, buaina avânga khawlai lên khapna.
(khiurias), adj. dîlchhût, thil chîk chi, hriat chian duh, mak ti, mak, danglam, vâng. curiosity, n.
(kharl), v.i., v.t. kir, vial, herh, kuai, tikir. n. sam kir, thil kir, thil kual, livir.
(khârmaring), n. kawpuar ri rawih rawih.
(kharant), n. grep rah rêp.
(karent), adj. kal lai, awm lai, awm mêk, tlânglâwn. n. luang, tlân, tui luang, boruak che, electric tha kal lai.
n. kual lai, ram khata pawisa hman lai.
(khari), n. Vai chawhmeh, hmuihmer chi hrang hrang (beraw mosola) nena chawhmeh cheibawl.
n. mosola leh aieng dip.
(khars), v.t. anchhe lawh. v.i. anchhe chelek. n. anchhia, thil \ha lo râpthlak tak.
(kharsid), adj. anchhe dawng, huatthlala.

(kharsawri), adj. tlan chhuak, ti thiak thuak, a kahpaha tih.
(khart), adj. tawi, chhum, \awng bung.
(kharteil), v.t. tan tawi, titawp, tichhum.
(kharten), n. puanzar, thil daidanna. behind the curtain, vantlâng hmuh phak lohvah. draw the curtain, puanzar hlim, lailang, hliahkhuh. iron curtain, inkal pawhna leh inkal thelhna daidangtu.
n. ennawm chhuah zawha a entutena a changtu an lawm bîk rawn intar lang leh tura an ngen chhuahna.
n. mut hmuna hmeichhiaina an pa a zilhna.
n. ennawm chhuaha a hmahruai atâna thil tenau an chhuah hmasak.

(kharv), n., v.t. and v.i. thil kawi, kawm, kual, kûl. curvature, n.

(khasp), n. hmâwr zum, ki zum, ha zum hriam lai.
(khas), n. anchhia, mi.
(khasid), adj. anchhe dawng, luhlul.
(khastard), n. bâwnghnute leh artui ilo chawhpawlha thlum.

(khastam), n. chin \han, hnam tih dân, hnam dân, bungruaa chhiah chawi.
n. mi rama bungraw thawn chhuah leh mi ram a\anga bungraw lâk luh a\anga sawrkar chhiah lâk.
adj. a dandeh, tih dân or chin dân ang.
n. dawrtu.

(khat), v.t., n. tan, zai, ât, sât, ker, hlep, sah, hliam, pem, bawhka, nuai bo, tikiam, lehkhaden kat. cut and dried, riruat lâwk, duan sa vek, phuah sa. cut it out, titawp rawh, ngawi chipcham rawh.
n. mi ipte hleh thlâka pawisa ilo rûk hmang.
n. thil \iak rawttu pangang.

n. chema sumdawnna, thil tanna hmanrua.

(saikhlawps), n. hmasâng Grik thawnthua mit pakhat chauh nei mi lian hnam.
(saikhlawstail), n. pisaa an hman \hin ang lehkha copy tam tak an her chhuahna khawl.
(saikhlawtrawn), n. thîr hipthei inkâra atom them (electron, etc.) kal lai kal chaktir lehzualna khawl.
(signit), n. vatâwk tuai.
(silindar), n. mûm sawl (chhêmthei, tuizêm, etc. ang) thei. cylindrical, adj.
(simbal), n. chhepchher atâna hman dâr kum pahnih khawn rîk, dârbenthek.
cynical (sinik, -al), n., adj. ui ang, mi thîp, mi kherkhiap, a chhuanchhe zawnga thil lâk hmang, hlimna mausamtu.
(sinisizm), n. hlim lohna, a dichim leh runthlâk zawnga thil lâkna, mihring engtona, lunghnûrna.
(si-, sainawshur), n. ui mei, Zangkhaw awp hnuaia Zangkhua ang ve tak arsi rual khi, Hmâr Arsi, mi mit latu.
(saipres), n. fâr thing chi.
(sist), n. phîng, bawm.
(chheh, chhek), n. Slav hnam, Czechoslovakia rama chêng.
d (di), n. Phoenician, Hebrai, Grik, Latin leh English hawrawpa a pali-na, solfa C key-a re, Roman number-a 500.
v.t. thil nêm taka vaw bek bek, chulh. n. themthiam.
(dabl), v.t. tuia thing, tuia theh. v.i. tui sawisa, beitham taka thil ti.
(dahshund, dakshunt), n. ui khân hniam leh rawng sei tak chi.
(dakawit), n. suamhmang a ruala chetla.
(daktil), n. zung\ang, hla thua ri pathum inzui (a hmasa chu thlûk sei, a zuitu pahnih chu thlûk ran, Entir nan - Lêngi man).
n. zung\ang ze awmze chhuina, zung\ang nêna zaizira inbiak dân.
n. zaizira inbiak dân.
daddy (dadi), n. pa, pa te kohna.
(dadl), v.i. pai, nghet lo taka kal.
(daf), v.i. ninhlei, infiam.
(dafawdil), n. pangpâr chi khat.
adj. rilru kim lo, chhan awm lova hlim thei.
n. bawlhhlawha sahmul khâwn.
(dagar), n. chemte lu zum.
(dagl), v.t., v.i. hnûk huh, theh huh.
(dêgaw), n. America rama Spain, Portugal leh Italy hnam thlah.
(dagarawtaip), n. thlalâk dân chi khat.
(dêlia), n. dalia pangpâr.
(deili), adj., adv. ni tin. n. ni tin chhuak chanchin bu.
(deinti), adj., tui, nêm, derthâwng. n. thil tui tak.
(deiri), n. bâwnghnute hmunpui, bâwnghnute hriak siamna hmun. dairy-farm, n. bâwng vulhna huan.
(deis), n. dawhsâng, thusawitu dinna dawhsâng, maichâm chungzâr.
(deizi), n. ram pangpâr chi khat.
n. dailuah.
(deil), n. ruam zâwl, ram kuam, lui ruam.
(dali), v.i. engmah lova hun khawh ral, infiam, inchûl.
(dalmêshan), adj. Dalmatia ram thil. n. Dalmatia ui râng.
(dawltanizm), n. rawng thliar hran theih lohna, sen leh hring hriat hran theih lohna, mahni duh dân ang leh tuina zâwnga lehkha zirna.
n. tuikhuahna, tui dahna. v.t. khuap. dam, n. ran pui, a nu, a pui.
(damij), n. thil tihchhiat, thil tihchhiat hlut lam or a man zât.
n. thil tihchhiat or tihhliam avânga zângnadawmna. v.t. tichhia, hliam.
n. puana thil lem \hui, damask rose pâr rawng sen.
(deim), n. chhûngpui nu, nu, hmeichhia, nu challang.
(dam), v.t. chatuan hremna tuartîr, hremhmuna kal tûra ruat, anchhe lawh.
(damnabl), adj. anchhe dawng tlâk, hrem tlâk, huatthlala.
(damneshn), n. thiamloh chantîrna, chatuan hremna.
(damd, hla thuah chuan damnid), adj. anchhe dawng, hremhmuna kal tûra ruat.
(daming, damning), adj. thiam lo, hrem tlâk, hrem chi.
n., adj. hnâwng, hnâwm, hlo, rilru nguai. dampen, v.t. tihnâwng.
(damzl), n. nula.
(dans), n., v.t., v.i., lâm.
(dandilaian), n. pangpâr chi khat.

v.t., n. khawvâr, êng \an, lang \an, chiang \an.
